Fly above Mugello with a Glider, taking off from Aeroclub Volovelistico del Mugello

. All year round, open on week-ends only, you can try the real emotion of silent flying without engine seeking soaring thermals above the Appennine mountains, on board of two-seats gliders with a professional pilot. The airdrome is located in Figliano, 2 miles north of Borgo San Lorenzo, and just 1/2 mile east of Mugello International Circuit.

value: address=Via di Mucciano 7 - 50032 Borgo San Lorenzo (FI)

content=Monsignor della Casa is a country resort located right 5 minutes away form Mugello racetrack. Hotel rooms, villas with pool, apartments: Monsignor della Casa offers many kind of comfortable accommodation and a wide variety of asport and activities.

content=Gaia Guest house is located in the Mugello Valley “the green heart of Tuscany” birthplace of Giotto and Medici family as well as the Florentine Reinassance, with its castles and medieval villages, such as Scarperia and Vicchio, two towns which still follow the traditions when it comes to local gastronomy.

content=18th century villa with lots of space: 6 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 4 living-rooms, library, diningroom and kitchen.  Views of the hills and the Apennines in the distance. Large Italian garden surrounding the property. Antique furniture, billiards, table-tennis, above ground swimming pool.
content=Family run, surrounded by greenery in Mugello near Florence. Private parking, privacy.
